trans-unit.source: Defines objects used to fill the interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
trans-unit.target: 定義用來填滿內部，例如矩形、 橢圓形、 派形、 多邊形和路徑的圖形化圖案的物件。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract base class and cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 這是抽象的基底類別，而且無法具現化。

trans-unit.source: To create a brush object, use classes derived from Brush, such as <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>, <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的筆刷物件，使用衍生自筆刷，例如<xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>， <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會建立的完全相同的複本<xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>這個方法建立。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 允許所使用的資源<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>物件重新配置原本用於其他用途。</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>所佔用。</xref:System.Drawing.Brush> </xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>。</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>參考。</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, sets a reference to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] brush object.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中，將參考設定為[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]筆刷物件。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] brush object.
trans-unit.target: 指標[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]筆刷物件。
